Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from a teacher can feel repetitive and reused (at no fault of their own, they are not paid enough to mark more than they need to. AI can help give more targeted feedback in certain areas.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I do sometimes feel like teacher feedback is a bit cold, simply for the rinse and repeat marking they have to do. AI feedback makes me feel nothing, only that humanity is edging closer to its end.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI is sometimes way off and teachers always on point with the marking scheme (but hey marking schemes don't always dictate how competent someone is, right?)
